ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"اصْلَوْهَا","word_ayah":16,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67578,"word_number_in_surah":54,"word_translation":"Burn in you","word_transliteration":"alaykum"},{"word_arabic":"إِنَّمَا","word_ayah":16,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":67585,"word_number_in_surah":61,"word_translation":"Only","word_transliteration":"innama"},{"word_arabic":"تُجْزَوْنَ","word_ayah":16,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":67586,"word_number_in_surah":62,"word_translation":"you (to)","word_transliteration":"kuntum"},{"word_arabic":"تَعْمَلُونَ","word_ayah":16,"word_number_in_ayah":12,"word_number_in_quran":67589,"word_number_in_surah":65,"word_translation":"do","word_transliteration":"ta'maluna"}]

[{"word_arabic":"مُتَّكِئِينَ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67609,"word_number_in_surah":85,"word_translation":"Reclining","word_transliteration":"muttakiina"},{"word_arabic":"عَلَى","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":67610,"word_number_in_surah":86,"word_translation":"on","word_transliteration":"ala"},{"word_arabic":"سُرُرٍ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":67611,"word_number_in_surah":87,"word_translation":"thrones","word_transliteration":"sururin"},{"word_arabic":"مَّصْفُوفَةٍ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":67612,"word_number_in_surah":88,"word_translation":"lined up","word_transliteration":"masfufatin"},{"word_arabic":"وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":67613,"word_number_in_surah":89,"word_translation":"and We will marry them","word_transliteration":"wazawwajnahum"},{"word_arabic":"بِحُورٍ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":67614,"word_number_in_surah":90,"word_translation":"to fair ones","word_transliteration":"bihurin"},{"word_arabic":"عِينٍ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":67615,"word_number_in_surah":91,"word_translation":"with large eyes","word_transliteration":"inin"}]

[{"word_arabic":"فَمَنَّ","word_ayah":27,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67667,"word_number_in_surah":143,"word_translation":"But Allah conferred favor","word_transliteration":"famanna"},{"word_arabic":"اللَّهُ","word_ayah":27,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":67668,"word_number_in_surah":144,"word_translation":"But Allah conferred favor","word_transliteration":"al-lahu"},{"word_arabic":"عَلَيْنَا","word_ayah":27,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":67669,"word_number_in_surah":145,"word_translation":"upon us","word_transliteration":"alayna"},{"word_arabic":"وَوَقَانَا","word_ayah":27,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":67670,"word_number_in_surah":146,"word_translation":"and protected us","word_transliteration":"wawaqana"},{"word_arabic":"عَذَابَ","word_ayah":27,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":67671,"word_number_in_surah":147,"word_translation":"(from the) punishment","word_transliteration":"adhaba"},{"word_arabic":"السَّمُومِ","word_ayah":27,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":67672,"word_number_in_surah":148,"word_translation":"(of) the Scorching Fire","word_transliteration":"al-samumi"}]

[{"word_arabic":"وَاصْبِرْ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67822,"word_number_in_surah":298,"word_translation":"So be patient","word_transliteration":"wa-is'bir"},{"word_arabic":"لِحُكْمِ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":67823,"word_number_in_surah":299,"word_translation":"for (the) Command","word_transliteration":"lihuk'mi"},{"word_arabic":"رَبِّكَ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":67824,"word_number_in_surah":300,"word_translation":"(of) your Lord","word_transliteration":"rabbika"},{"word_arabic":"فَإِنَّكَ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":67825,"word_number_in_surah":301,"word_translation":"for indeed you","word_transliteration":"fa-innaka"},{"word_arabic":"بِأَعْيُنِنَا","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":67826,"word_number_in_surah":302,"word_translation":"(are) in Our Eyes","word_transliteration":"bi-a'yunina"},{"word_arabic":"وَسَبِّحْ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":67827,"word_number_in_surah":303,"word_translation":"And glorify","word_transliteration":"wasabbih"},{"word_arabic":"بِحَمْدِ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":67828,"word_number_in_surah":304,"word_translation":"(the) praise","word_transliteration":"bihamdi"},{"word_arabic":"رَبِّكَ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":67829,"word_number_in_surah":305,"word_translation":"(of) your Lord","word_transliteration":"rabbika"},{"word_arabic":"حِينَ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":67830,"word_number_in_surah":306,"word_translation":"when","word_transliteration":"hina"},{"word_arabic":"تَقُومُ","word_ayah":48,"word_number_in_ayah":10,"word_number_in_quran":67831,"word_number_in_surah":307,"word_translation":"you arise","word_transliteration":"taqumu"}]
